.. _apptainer_oci_start:

apptainer oci start
-------------------

Start container process (root user only)

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  Start invoke start operation to start a previously created container 
  identified by container ID.

::

  apptainer oci start <container_ID>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ apptainer oci start mycontainer

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for start

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`apptainer oci <apptainer_oci>` 	 - Manage OCI containers

*Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 21-Feb-2022*
